definitions.title: Pron. 3 pl.
definitions.body: they, them (= BH [[הֵם]], [[הֵמָּה]], q.v., but the more original forms. Eg. Aram. [[המו]] CIS:145 B 4 (Cooke:207),:149 A 1, S-C:Pap. C 7, 10 +; not Targum Syr., which use [[אִנּוּן]] 0enuwn, henuwn, instead; Ar. humu, humo. The n in [[הִמּוֹן]], as in [[דֵּין]], [[אִלֵּין]], by the side of [[זֶה]], [[אֵלֶּה]], 0’uwla0’i; Nö:M 86 W:CG 106);—they, them:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as nom. Ezr 5:11 [[אֲבַחְנׇא הִמּוֹ עַבְדוֹהִי]] we are his servants (constr. as in Syr., Nö:§ 312 D Mt 5:13, K:§ 87. 3).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as accus. (in BAram., as in Syr., there being no verbal sf. of 3 pl.; so Eg. Aram. Cooke:76 B 4, S-C:Pap. E 5 +), Dn Da 2:34 [[והדקת הִמּוֹ]] and crushed them, v:Da 2:35, Da 3:22, Ezr 4:10, Ezr 4:23, Ezr 5:5, Ezr 5:12, Ezr 5:14, Ezr 5:14, Ezr 5:15, Ezr 7:17.—Comp. [[אִנּוּן]].
